meanings.sent1: I practiced my summarization skills by writing a short summary of the story.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to write a summarization of the chapter we read.
meanings.sent3: My summarization of the movie plot made my friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her summarization of the complex topic was like a flashlight in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The art of summarization helps us understand information more easily.

meanings.definition: A brief statement that gives the most important information about something.
meanings.sent1: The summarization at the beginning of the article helped me grasp the main points quickly.
meanings.sent2: Can you provide a summarization of the key findings from the research study?
meanings.sent3: His one-sentence summarization of the movie was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: The summarization of the event was like a map guiding us through the details.
meanings.sent5: I rely on summarization to get to the heart of the matter efficiently.
